0: This is a great locations for all sporting events and a very clean hotel for business stays when there are no games being played
Stayed here at the end of March 2015 for an event being held downtown
I recommend as a hotel to stay for a game and to hold training conferences or meetings
The hotel was convenient to my business meetings and the highway
convenient and nice hotel close to sports venues
Elizabeth Bruno and Rodney GREAT LOCATION FOR STADIUM EVENTS
While the location is excellent to walk to the venue we would not ever repeat the stay
Great place to stay for events at sports venues
We booked this hotel for a concert months before the event and this hotel because it was so close to the concert
Nice hotel close to sports venues
1: An adequate place to stay particularly if you are coming for an event at the sports complex

When we came back from a gathering around 130pm there were at least 8 cop cars in the parking lot with policemen standing outside something about a party in the bar getting out of hand and shots being fired in the parking lot
I am sure it is a great location if you are attending a sports event across the street but business folk who travel a lot will want to look elsewhere
There was a church convention there and it was SO LOUD
Remind you I Ddnt find out about them being sold out until AFTER I paid them for the meeting rooms
Needless to say once my event started my guest had ABSOLUTELY nowhere to park
Heater in our room did not function well no matter what I tried to do it was either on all the time which made the room stifling hot or off which made the room freezing
One thing to know is that all of the hotels in the sporting activity area charge an extra tax
We were attending a convention downtown KC and this hotel was only to us about 10 minutes to get where we were going
I would use Four Points for my gathering
